Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server

  • class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates information and logic related to a server in the simulation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int id
      An internal ID for this server.
      private Customer myCustomer
      The current customer being served.
      private Queue myQueue
      The customer queue this server gets its next customer from.
      private static int numOfServers
      The number of servers created so far.
      private boolean onBreak
      A toggle if serve goes on break.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Server​(Queue q)
      Create a server with a given customer queue to draw customer from.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void backFromBreak​()
      Sets server status to be off break.
      void done​()
      The server is done serving myCustomer.
      Customer getNextCustomer​()
      Find a customer to serve next.
      void goForBreak​()
      Sets server status to be on break.
      boolean isIdle​()
      Check if the current server is idle or not.
      void serve​(Customer customer)
      Serve the given customer.
      java.lang.String toString​()
      Return a string representation of the current server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        The customer queue this server gets its next customer from.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(Queue q)
        Create a server with a given customer queue to draw customer from.
        Parameters:
        q - A queue of customer

    • Method Detail

      • getNextCustomer

        public Customer getNextCustomer​()
        Find a customer to serve next. The customer is removed from the customer queue and returned. If no customer is available, this server becomes idle.
        Returns:
        The new customer to be served.

      • serve

        public void serve​(Customer customer)
        Serve the given customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to be served.

      • done

        public void done​()
        The server is done serving myCustomer.

      • isIdle

        public boolean isIdle​()
        Check if the current server is idle or not. Server must not be serving a customer and on a break to be idle.
        Returns:
        true if the server is idle, false otherwise.

      • goForBreak

        public void goForBreak​()
        Sets server status to be on break.

      • backFromBreak

        public void backFromBreak​()
        Sets server status to be off break.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Return a string representation of the current server.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The server id prefixed with "S" in string format.
